channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make it so that when a new player joins, it makes a certain npc talk to him? I know how to make him spawn in a certain place, but i want a tutorial npc to talk to him as well, and I don't know how to make that happen without the player clicking talk. Please help
Update: still need help with this issue
